body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Haven customer support. My name is Adam Peterson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Adam, my name is Pamela Edwards.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Pamela. I'm sorry to hear about the noisy neighbors issue. Could you please provide me with your room number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am in room five zero three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Pamela. Additionally, could you provide me with the exact time you experienced the noise issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The noise issue occurred at twelve zero zero midnight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Pamela. We will address this matter promptly. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I hope this issue gets resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Pamela. We'll ensure a peaceful stay for you. Have a pleasant day.
